verbs.description: < p > U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller [V: has] subpoenaed a key assistant of long - time Donald Trump adviser Roger Stone , two people with knowledge of the matter said , the latest sign that Mueller 's investigation into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 election is increasingly focusing on Stone.</p >

< p > [ARG0: U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller] has [V: subpoenaed] [ARG1: a key assistant of long - time Donald Trump adviser Roger Stone] , two people with knowledge of the matter said , the latest sign that Mueller 's investigation into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 election is increasingly focusing on Stone.</p >

< p > U.S. Special Counsel Robert Mueller has subpoenaed a key assistant of long - time Donald Trump adviser Roger Stone , two people with knowledge of the matter said , the latest sign that Mueller 's investigation into [V: alleged] [ARG1: Russian meddling] in the 2016 election is increasingly focusing on Stone.</p >
